page.title: 11A DAY IN MY DADS LIFE
page.content:
My name is Martin Jones. My dad works at the Three Tuns brewery.
He makes beer with malt,barley, hops, barley,hops, finings,yeast liquor.
It takes 10 hours to brew it,6 days in the vat,14 days in a barrel.21 days together.
Malt comes from the Grist Hopper through the masher head into the mash tun which is like a huge bath were it is mixed with scalding water and left to soak for two hours adding hops, sugar, salt,and copper finings then into the vat.The yeast is added and the beer is cooled to 67% and the fermentation begins.
